price: Dájúdájú àwọn tó pẹ̀yìn dà (sí ’Islām) lẹ́yìn tí ìmọ̀nà ti fojú hàn sí wọn, Èṣù ló ṣe ìṣìnà ní ọ̀ṣọ́ fún wọn. Ó sì fún wọn ní ìrètí asán nípa ẹ̀mí gígùn.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱرۡتَدُّواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَدۡبَٰرِهِم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَى ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ سَوَّلَ لَهُمۡ وَأَمۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ir'taddū ʿalā adbārihim min baʿdi mā tabayyana lahumu al-hudā al-shayṭānu sawwala lahum wa-amlā lahum
